Title: Fire in the Hole
Plot: Gunslinging U.S. Marshal Raylan Givens faces off against his oldest friend in Harlan, Kentucky, a 21st Century Wild West.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sexual references
GuestStars: Joelle Carter, Natalie Zea, Damon Herriman, Matt Craven, Peter Greene, Doug E. Doug, Kevin Rankin, Ryan O'Nan, Joel Garland, Daniel Stewart Sherman, Walton Goggins
